title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Clippers, Luka Doncic, Cowboys
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Clippers, Luka Doncic, Cowboys
description:
Colin explains why he has no problem with the Clippers being rough with Mavericks G Luka Doncic, why he's more excited about Seahawks QB Russell Wilson, and the major difference between the 49ers and the Cowboys.


Guest: Nick Wright

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
